content: अभिष्यं(स्यं)दः {@--1@} Oozing, flowing, trickling. {@--2@} Weakness of, or running at, the eyes. {@--3@} Great increase or enlargement, surplus, excess, superfluous portion; स्वर्गाभिष्यंदवमनं कृत्वेवोपनिवेशितं (ओषधिप्रस्थं) <ls>Ku. 6. 37</ls> by drawing off the surplus population {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} by emigration (अभिष्यंदः अतिरेकः अतिरिक्तजन इति यावत् तस्य वमनं निःसारणं कृत्वा स्थितमिव); <ab>cf.</ab> also <ls>R. 15. 29</ls> Hemacandra's remarks thereon.
